feed.title: GitHub Scala Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Scala in GitHub

entry.title: lovescala/Lift-Comet-Example
entry.summary:
A working example of the comet code from The Definitive Guide to Lift book

Comet-Enabled Lift Example

The code found in the firstPress copy of The Definitive Guide to Lift is not perfect. This project contains a working copy of the more advanced Comet-Enabled Application code.

Read more at http://technovangelism.com/blog/2009/06/14/a-comet-enabled-lift-application/

Try it out

git clone git://github.com/erikperson/Lift-Comet-Example.git

entry.title: davidillsley/mongomacros
entry.summary:
Experimentation with scala macros and mongo

The Macros are in macros/ and the code which uses them in core/ as macros and their users have to be in separate compilation units
